title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:

**Why Choose Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels?**

- **Bulk Convenience**: A single purchase delivers 12 huge rolls right to your doorstep, ensuring you won't run out quickly. This pack is equivalent to 38 regular rolls - that's a lot of spills cleaned and surfaces polished!

- **Superior Absorbency**: These 2-ply sheets are designed to soak up to 75% more liquid compared to leading 1-ply brands. Spilled some tea or dropped an egg? No problem, Presto! towels have you covered.

- **Gentle on Skin, Tough on Spills**: Each roll contains 158 sheets of soft yet strong paper towels, combining gentle touch with robust cleaning power.

- **Trusted Quality**: Compared to the well-known Bounty Paper Towels, Presto! provides a reliable and satisfying cleaning experience, as attested by many happy users.

- **Economical and Efficient**: With a total of 12 rolls, each with 158 sheets, you're getting a premium product without the premium price tag.

- **Simple to Store**: The white color and standard sizing make these rolls a neat and tidy addition to any kitchen or cleaning cupboard.

For our elderly friends, rest assured that the Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are designed with your convenience in mind.
